abstract: An acttivist hedge fund Knight Vinke on Tuesday accelerated its attack on HSBC with a fresh call to “grasp the nettle” and tear up its existing strategy.
lead_paragraph: An acttivist hedge fund Knight Vinke on Tuesday accelerated its attack on HSBC with a fresh call to “grasp the nettle” and tear up its existing strategy.

headline.main: Activist Fund Steps Up Pressure on HSBC
